notifications.budgetUpdatedDesc: Your budget for {{category}} has been updated.
notifications.budgetsCreatedDesc: Your monthly budgets have been set.
notifications.micDeniedDesc: Please allow microphone access in your browser's site settings to use this feature.
notifications.speechNotSupported: Speech recognition is not supported in your browser.
notifications.roundupGoalExistsDesc: '{{title}}' is already your active round-up goal. Please disable it first.

addBudget.reviewDescription: The AI has generated the following budgets. Review them and make any necessary changes before saving.
addBudget.manualDescription: Manually add a budget for a category, and optionally add checklist items to it.
addBudget.noBudgetsDesc: The AI didn't find any new budgets to create from your request. This could be because they already exist. You can still add one manually.
addBudget.textDescription: Describe your monthly budgets. The AI will structure them for you.
addBudget.textPlaceholder: e.g., Budget {{currency}}500 for Groceries to buy milk and bread. Also, {{currency}}150 for transportation...
addBudget.voiceDescription: Press the button and start speaking to create your budgets.
addBudget.cameraDescription: Position a document or list in the frame and capture an image to scan it.
addBudget.uploadDescription: Upload an image of a document or shopping list.

addInvestment.description: Manually add an asset to your portfolio. For crypto, prices update live.

addSavingsGoal.description: Use AI to generate a savings goal from natural language. Describe what you want to save for, how much, and by when.
addSavingsGoal.loading: AI is setting up your goal...
addSavingsGoal.placeholder: e.g., I want to save $2,500 for a trip to Italy next summer.
addSavingsGoal.reviewDescription: Review the details below and make any changes before saving your goal.
addSavingsGoal.roundupDescription: Automatically save spare change from your expenses towards this goal. Only one goal can be active at a time.

addChecklist.textDescription: Describe your checklist. The AI will structure it for you.
addChecklist.textPlaceholder: e.g., Weekly grocery run for milk, bread, and eggs for about $75
addChecklist.voiceDescription: Press the button and start speaking.
addChecklist.cameraDescription: Position a document or list in the frame and capture an image to scan it.
addChecklist.uploadDescription: Upload an image of a document or shopping list.
addChecklist.reviewDescription: The AI has generated the following checklist. Review and make any necessary changes before saving.
addChecklist.manualDescription: Manually add a title, icon, and items to create your checklist.

addTrip.textDescription: Describe your trip. The AI will structure it into an itemized plan.
addTrip.textPlaceholder: e.g., A trip to Japan for two weeks...
addTrip.voiceDescription: Start speaking and the AI will transcribe and create your plan.
addTrip.cameraDescription: Position a document in the frame and capture an image to scan it.
addTrip.uploadDescription: Upload an image of a document, like a brochure or a quote.
addTrip.reviewDescription: The AI has generated the following plan. Review the items and make any necessary changes before saving.
addTrip.manualDescription: Manually add a title and items to create your trip plan.
addTrip.itemErrors: There are errors in your plan items.
addTrip.addMoreDescription: You can modify your description below and regenerate the plan.
addTrip.addMorePlaceholder: Type here to add more details to your plan...
